subject: Football
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Thirty years later, Washington’s Mark Moseley remains the only kicker to win the Associated Press N.F.L. Most Valuable Player award, which dates to 1957.
snippet: Thirty years later, Washington’s Mark Moseley remains the only kicker to win the Associated Press N.F.L. Most Valuable Player award, which dates to 1957.
